title: Legacy Skin Question
body:
What would be a good way to see what legacy skins are available? Just check the shop everyday? I know it's a weird question, but just wanted to know if there was something I was missing. Ty.

Edit: The Legacy skins I want the most are Winter Wonder Orianna and Phantom Karthus.

replies.body:
Heres another legacy skin question... WHY DOESNT TALIYAH HAVE ANY LEGACY SKINS? 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AembRAhF-there-are-still-only-2-taliyah-skins-and-im-crying    {{champion:163}}
winter wonder ori is most likely going to be available soon if riot do a Christmas sale, and your likely to never see phantom karthus unless he gets a visual update
